EmailTemplate.name: Upcoming Salesforce Changes 23 Dev
EmailTemplate.subject: PLEASE READ: Changes to salesforce Opportunities
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
This week's release includes bug fixes and performance improvements. In addition, this release contains a change to the Primary Member field on Opportunities.
Primary Member Opportunity Field - Changes
There were previously two "Primary Member" fields in Salesforce. One was on the Opportunity and the other on the Account.
The Account "Primary Member" field is what determines who Spacestation sends paperwork to. The "Primary Member" field on Opportunities has no impact in determining who should sign paperwork.
To prevent confusion over these two identically named fields, we are renaming the Opportunity "Primary Member" field to "Key Contact" instead.
The "Primary Member" field on Opportunities will be renamed to "Key Contact" The "Primary Member" field on Accounts will remain unchanged Paperwork is sent to Account "Primary Member" Opportunity "Key Contact" is a decision maker on the deal but may or may not be the Primary Member / Paperwork Signatory
Sincerely, Susie
